item.title: CSS Madness
item.author: kelly.ripple@bti360.com (Kelly Ripple)
item.description: I spent the past week learning HTML and CSS, having zero prior experience with either. With the right guidance, it’s surprisingly doable. No learning experience is complete without some moments of struggle, and I had plenty. Hopefully you will be able to benefit from my pain. The two worst positioning nightmares I came accross were position:relative/absolute/fixed and display:inline/block/inline-block. I’ll run through the definitions of each, and include my advice on using the things.
